text: (napiyē!) Umakku muṉṉar (paṟpala camūkaṅkaḷukkum) nām aṉuppiya tūtarkaḷ (antanta camūkaṅkaḷiṉ) ūrkaḷilirunta maṉitarkaḷēyaṉṟi vēṟillai avarkaḷukku nām vahī mūlam (nam kaṭṭaḷaikaḷai) aṟivittōm - ivarkaḷ pūmiyil pirayāṇam ceytu ivarkaḷukku muṉ iruntavarkaḷiṉ muṭivu eppaṭiyiruntatu eṉpataip pārkka villaiyā? Maṟumai vīṭutāṉ payapaktiyuṭaiyavarkaḷukku mikavum mēlāṉatākum; (itaṉai) nīṅkaḷ (cintittu) viḷaṅkikkoḷḷa vēṇṭāmā
